text:
“Quite right, Dounia,” said Pulcheria Alexandrovna. 

“Since you have decided, so be it. I shall feel easier myself.” 

She paused, her eyes serious. 

“I do not like concealment and deception. Better let us have the whole truth.” 

“Pyotr Petrovitch may be angry or not, now!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pulcheria Alexandrovna expresses relief at Dounia's decision, emphasizing the importance of honesty over concealment.
